verses.verse: So they brought <WH935> <WH853> the ark <WH727> of God, <WH430> and set <WH3322> it in the midst <WH8432> of the tent <WH168> that <WH834> David <WH1732> had pitched <WH5186> for it: and they offered <WH7126> burnt sacrifices <WH5930> and peace offerings <WH8002> before <WH6440> God. <WH430>

And when David <WH1732> had made an end <WH3615> of offering <WH4480> <WH5927> the burnt offerings <WH5930> and the peace offerings, <WH8002> he blessed <WH1288> <WH853> the people <WH5971> in the name <WH8034> of the LORD. <WH3068>

And he dealt <WH2505> to every one <WH3605> <WH376> of Israel, <WH3478> both man <WH4480> <WH376> and woman, <WH802> to every one <WH376> a loaf <WH3603> of bread, <WH3899> and a good piece of flesh, <WH829> and a flagon <WH809> of wine.

And he appointed <WH5414> certain of <WH4480> the Levites <WH3881> to minister <WH8334> before <WH6440> the ark <WH727> of the LORD, <WH3068> and to record, <WH2142> and to thank <WH3034> and praise <WH1984> the LORD <WH3068> God <WH430> of Israel: <WH3478>

Asaph <WH623> the chief, <WH7218> and next <WH4932> to him Zechariah, <WH2148> Jeiel, <WH3273> and Shemiramoth, <WH8070> and Jehiel, <WH3171> and Mattithiah, <WH4993> and Eliab, <WH446> and Benaiah, <WH1141> and Obed-edom: <WH5654> and Jeiel <WH3273> with psalteries <WH3627> <WH5035> and with harps; <WH3658> but Asaph <WH623> made a sound <WH8085> with cymbals; <WH4700>
Benaiah <WH1141> also and Jahaziel <WH3166> the priests <WH3548> with trumpets <WH2689> continually <WH8548> before <WH6440> the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> of God. <WH430>

Then <WH227> on that <WH1931> day <WH3117> David <WH1732> delivered <WH5414> first <WH7218> this psalm to thank <WH3034> the LORD <WH3068> into the hand <WH3027> of Asaph <WH623> and his brethren. <WH251>
Give thanks <WH3034> unto the LORD, <WH3068> call <WH7121> upon his name, <WH8034> make known <WH3045> his deeds <WH5949> among the people. <WH5971>
Sing <WH7891> unto him, sing psalms <WH2167> unto him, talk <WH7878> ye of all <WH3605> his wondrous works. <WH6381>
Glory <WH1984> ye in his holy <WH6944> name: <WH8034> let the heart <WH3820> of them rejoice <WH8055> that seek <WH1245> the LORD. <WH3068>
Seek <WH1875> the LORD <WH3068> and his strength, <WH5797> seek <WH1245> his face <WH6440> continually. <WH8548>
Remember <WH2142> his marvelous works <WH6381> that <WH834> he hath done, <WH6213> his wonders, <WH4159> and the judgments <WH4941> of his mouth; <WH6310>
O ye seed <WH2233> of Israel <WH3478> his servant, <WH5650> ye children <WH1121> of Jacob, <WH3290> his chosen ones. <WH972>
He <WH1931> is the LORD <WH3068> our God; <WH430> his judgments <WH4941> are in all <WH3605> the earth. <WH776>
Be ye mindful <WH2142> always <WH5769> of his covenant; <WH1285> the word <WH1697> which he commanded <WH6680> to a thousand <WH505> generations; <WH1755>
Even of the covenant which <WH834> he made <WH3772> with <WH854> Abraham, <WH85> and of his oath <WH7621> unto Isaac; <WH3327>
And hath confirmed <WH5975> the same to Jacob <WH3290> for a law, <WH2706> and to Israel <WH3478> for an everlasting <WH5769> covenant, <WH1285>
Saying, <WH559> Unto thee will I give <WH5414> the land <WH776> of Canaan, <WH3667> the lot <WH2256> of your inheritance; <WH5159>
When ye were <WH1961> but few, <WH4962> even a few, <WH4592> and strangers <WH1481> in it.
And when they went <WH1980> from nation <WH4480> <WH1471> to <WH413> nation, <WH1471> and from one kingdom <WH4480> <WH4467> to <WH413> another <WH312> people; <WH5971>
He suffered <WH5117> no <WH3808> man <WH376> to do them wrong: <WH6231> yea, he reproved <WH3198> kings <WH4428> for their sakes, <WH5921>
Saying, Touch <WH5060> not <WH408> mine anointed, <WH4899> and do <WH7489> my prophets <WH5030> no <WH408> harm.
Sing <WH7891> unto the LORD, <WH3068> all <WH3605> the earth; <WH776> show forth <WH1319> from day <WH4480> <WH3117> to <WH413> day <WH3117> his salvation. <WH3444>
Declare <WH5608> <WH853> his glory <WH3519> among the heathen; <WH1471> his marvelous works <WH6381> among all <WH3605> nations. <WH5971>
For <WH3588> great <WH1419> is the LORD, <WH3068> and greatly <WH3966> to be praised: <WH1984> he <WH1931> also is to be feared <WH3372> above <WH5921> all <WH3605> gods. <WH430>
For <WH3588> all <WH3605> the gods <WH430> of the people <WH5971> are idols: <WH457> but the LORD <WH3068> made <WH6213> the heavens. <WH8064>
Glory <WH1935> and honor <WH1926> are in his presence; <WH6440> strength <WH5797> and gladness <WH2304> are in his place. <WH4725>
Give <WH3051> unto the LORD, <WH3068> ye kindreds <WH4940> of the people, <WH5971> give <WH3051> unto the LORD <WH3068> glory <WH3519> and strength. <WH5797>

Give <WH3051> unto the LORD <WH3068> the glory <WH3519> due unto his name: <WH8034> bring <WH5375> an offering, <WH4503> and come <WH935> before <WH6440> him: worship <WH7812> the LORD <WH3068> in the beauty <WH1927> of holiness. <WH6944>
Fear <WH2342> before <WH4480> <WH6440> him, all <WH3605> the earth: <WH776> the world <WH8398> also <WH637> shall be stable, <WH3559> that it be not <WH1077> moved. <WH4131>
Let the heavens <WH8064> be glad, <WH8055> and let the earth <WH776> rejoice: <WH1523> and let men say <WH559> among the nations, <WH1471> The LORD <WH3068> reigneth. <WH4427>
Let the sea <WH3220> roar, <WH7481> and the fullness <WH4393> thereof: let the fields <WH7704> rejoice, <WH5970> and all <WH3605> that <WH834> is therein.

Then <WH227> shall the trees <WH6086> of the wood <WH3293> sing out <WH7442> at the presence <WH4480> <WH6440> of the LORD, <WH3068> because <WH3588> he cometh <WH935> to judge <WH8199> <WH853> the earth. <WH776>
O give thanks <WH3034> unto the LORD; <WH3068> for <WH3588> he is good; <WH2896> for <WH3588> his mercy <WH2617> endureth forever. <WH5769>

And say <WH559> ye, Save <WH3467> us, O God <WH430> of our salvation, <WH3468> and gather us together, <WH6908> and deliver <WH5337> us from <WH4480> the heathen, <WH1471> that we may give thanks <WH3034> to thy holy <WH6944> name, <WH8034> and glory <WH7623> in thy praise. <WH8416>

Blessed <WH1288> be the LORD <WH3068> God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478> forever <WH4480> <WH5769> and ever. <WH5704> <WH5769> And all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> said, <WH559> Amen, <WH543> and praised <WH1984> the LORD. <WH3068>

So he left <WH5800> there <WH8033> before <WH6440> the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> of the LORD <WH3068> Asaph <WH623> and his brethren, <WH251> to minister <WH8334> before <WH6440> the ark <WH727> continually, <WH8548> as every day's work required: <WH1697> <WH3117> <WH3117>
And Obed-edom <WH5654> with their brethren, <WH251> threescore <WH8346> and eight; <WH8083> Obed-edom <WH5654> also the son <WH1121> of Jeduthun <WH3038> and Hosah <WH2621> to be porters: <WH7778>

And Zadok <WH6659> the priest, <WH3548> and his brethren <WH251> the priests, <WH3548> before <WH6440> the tabernacle <WH4908> of the LORD <WH3068> in the high place <WH1116> that <WH834> was at Gibeon, <WH1391>

To offer <WH5927> burnt offerings <WH5930> unto the LORD <WH3068> upon <WH5921> the altar <WH4196> of the burnt offering <WH5930> continually <WH8548> morning <WH1242> and evening, <WH6153> and to do according to all <WH3605> that is written <WH3789> in the law <WH8451> of the LORD, <WH3068> which <WH834> he commanded <WH6680> Israel; <WH3478>

And with <WH5973> them Heman <WH1968> and Jeduthun, <WH3038> and the rest <WH7605> that were chosen, <WH1305> who <WH834> were expressed <WH5344> by name, <WH8034> to give thanks <WH3034> to the LORD, <WH3068> because <WH3588> his mercy <WH2617> endureth forever; <WH5769>

And with <WH5973> them Heman <WH1968> and Jeduthun <WH3038> with trumpets <WH2689> and cymbals <WH4700> for those that should make a sound, <WH8085> and with musical <WH7892> instruments <WH3627> of God. <WH430> And the sons <WH1121> of Jeduthun <WH3038> were porters. <WH8179>
And all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> departed <WH1980> every man <WH376> to his house: <WH1004> and David <WH1732> returned <WH5437> to bless <WH1288> <WH853> his house. <WH1004>
